name: Cold-Blooded Strike
title: Kaeya: Cold-Blooded Strike
inPlayDescription: After your Kaeya, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Frostgnaw, he heals himself for 2 HP. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Kaeya to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Kaeya, equip this card.After Kaeya equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Frostgnaw once.After your Kaeya, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Frostgnaw, he heals himself for 2 HP. (Once per Round)(You must have Kaeya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
